summary: Simon, a deeply religious man living in the 4th century, wants to be nearer to God so he climbs a column. The Devil wants him to come down to Earth and is trying to seduce him.
cast: Claudio Brook|Enrique Álvarez Félix|Hortensia Santoveña|Francisco Reiguera|Luis Aceves Castañeda|Enrique García Álvarez|Antonio Bravo|Enrique del Castillo|Eduardo MacGregor|Silvia Pinal|Ricardo Adalid|Victorio Blanco|Jesús Fernández|Nathanael León|Ángel Merino|Rubén Márquez|Glauber Rocha
title: Simón del desierto
